note:
Hello! My name is Jacob and I'm principal engineer at Conservify, a non-profit conservation technology lab. I spend most of my day working on FieldKit, a fully OSS/OSH environmental sensor platform.

A few of my favorite things: software, hardware, music, reading, woodworking, cooking, nature, stained glass, and amateur radio (KN6YLK)

[avatar: A photo of my face with a goofy and, I hope, friendly smile.]
[banner: A calm early morning landscape photo of a desert lake, mountains in the distance.]
